message.raw:
Added basic support for gnu precompiled headers

currently enabled in transport, physics, rendering, and math
a custom target called gazebo_pch was added, and one pch is used for all projects

TODO:
 - improve how flags are captured in order to compile the pch
 - record some more timing information to figure out if this is actually faster
 - generate multiple pch, since some libraries (common) use -pthread and so have extra flags

Priliminary timing info:

gazebo common (needs -pthread when building pch)
no pch: 2m
pch: 1m 30s

gazebo math
no pch: 25s
pch: 35s

gazebo physics
no pch: 11m 15s
pch: 9m 25s

gazebo transport
no pch: 1m
pch: 50s

gazebo rendering
no pch: 30m
pch: 40m

currently enabled in transport, physics, rendering, and math
a custom target called gazebo_pch was added, and one pch is used for all projects

TODO:
 - improve how flags are captured in order to compile the pch
 - record some more timing information to figure out if this is actually faster
 - generate multiple pch, since some libraries (common) use -pthread and so have extra flags
